entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasi] `Invariant.Tests` failing with `Failed to load ./icudt.dat` #82567
  • Improve codegen for Vector128.Shift* operations where a direct intrinsic is not available #82564
  • [wasi] Tracking issue for test failures #82561
  • [API Proposal]: Vector128/256 AddSaturate/RemoveSaturate #82559
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Create FrozenArray #82552
  • Garbage collector may crash when new byte[] and GC.AllocateUninitializedArray(n, true) is mixed extensively. #82548
    8.0.0
  • NTLM 401 macOS (Apple sillicon) #82547
  • llvm-symbolizer invocation failure #82544
  • Mono: Crash when accessing a field of a null class object #82535
  • Sample to customize what STJ considers a 'JSON null'/Ignoring property writing #82530
  • Investigate adjusting herustics for unrolled block copies/initialization #82529
  • HttpStress execution failure on Windows #82528
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add a RangeAttribute constructor supporting arbitrary IComparable ranges. #82526
    Future
  • C# mangling affects troubleshooting #82524
  • Unexpected `QuicStream.WriteAsync` exception #82523
  • [API Proposal]: Make Parallel.For method support function pointers #82522
  • Regressions in System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.PhysicalAddressTests #82537
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 4 Regressions on 2/19/2023 10:06:54 AM #82538
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 9 Regressions on 2/14/2023 11:18:21 PM #82540
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 10 Regressions on 2/20/2023 2:00:07 PM #82541
  • [BUG] Version downgrade in .NET 7 for System.IO.Compression.Native.dll leads to broken Microsoft Installers #82518
  • [wasi] Wasi.Build.Tests - windows failures #82515
    8.0.0
  • .net 8 Failed SSL Connection at andoird api 21 download #82514
  • Half type Max/Min value is different from documentation #82508
  • ComInterfaceGenerator generates code with pointer type in generic #82504

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] cross-compiling to osx-arm64 from osx-x64 does not work #82542
    8.0.0
  • Eliminate allocations when enumerating empty collections #59596
    8.0.0
  • EnsureCapacity() on List<> increments the version #82455
    Future
  • No .webcil files after publish [Linux/x64 - static Blazor WASM] #82549
    8.0.0
  • The Parallel.ForEachAsync with synchronous source can block many threads #81877
  • Test failure Loader/classloader/DefaultInterfaceMethods/reabstraction/reabstraction/reabstraction.sh #82127
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expand data validation attributes #77402
    8.0.0
  • Rename linker to illink #78059
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Globalization.Tests.StringSearch and System.Tests.Perf_Single #82539
  • [wasi] `System.Globalization.CultureNotFoundException : Only the invariant culture is supported in globalization-invariant mode. ` #81908
    8.0.0
  • Can't retrieve MemoryCache statistics using dotnet-counters #82502
  • superpmi diff/replay jobs are failing #82506
  • get some docker images with libmsquic from main that contains OpenSSL 3 -- @wfurt #82463
  • Segmentation fault in static library (AOT) #82511
  • Add possibility to add configuration files from anywhere #82485
  • Consider adding IEqualityOperators<string, string, bool> to System.String #81173

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Determine IlcHostPackageName from host OS, not target OS #82566
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement RSA.GetMaxOutputSize #82565
    area-System.Security
  • Remove fragile NGen logic for precomputed hashcodes #82563
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [6.0] Fix intellisense xml file selection from 'net' or 'dotnet-plat-ext' #82562
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • Add PeriodicTimer.Period property #82560
  • Add and use public TaskToAsyncResult helper type #82557
  • [class] Don't put DIMs into the vtable of abstract classes #82556
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][debugger] Support symbol server on mobile devices #82555
  • [7.0] Fix intellisense xml file selection from 'net' or 'dotnet-plat-ext' #82554
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • Support raw ECDH key agreements #82551
    area-System.Security
  • eng/SourceBuild.props: when unset, let the repo determine RuntimeOS. #82546
    community-contribution
  • Move throw out of inlined CompositeFormat helper #82543
  • Make area-owners.json true source for all area like labels dependencies #82534
  • [browser] remove custom startup sequence of blazor #82532
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • .NET 6: enable building on platforms where strict-prototypes is on by default. #82525
    community-contribution
  • Vectorize Convert.FromHexString #82521
  • [mono] permission denied when reading a jitdump file #82520
    community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Emit llvm intrinsic declarations lazily. #82519
  • Remove EXTRA_*FLAGS. #82516
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Share some "Compiles" tests with ComInterfaceSourceGenerator #82505

Merged

  • Add osx-arm64 to official RIDs in ILCompiler NuGet #82558
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add RCPC ISA detection on win-arm64 #82527
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasi] Add `wasi-experimental` workload, `wasiconsole` template, and `Wasi.Build.Tests` #81849
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [workload] Upstream net7 manifest json and targets #82267
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Return singleton enumerators from IEnumerable.GetEnumerator for empty collections #82499
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Use throw helpers in a few more places #82533
  • Refactor common variables used for the "send runtime tests to helix" steps into a shared template that all of our pipelines that run runtime tests can use. #81926
    area-Infrastructure
  • [JIT] On importing a CEE_INITOBJ for a simd, construct a VecCon(0) #81982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] Always transform `AND(X, CNS(-1))` to `X` #82276
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove unnecessary _version++ from a few places #82500
    area-System.Collections, 8.0.0
  • Rename ProduceBy enum to Tool #82550
    linkable-framework, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Don't spend cycles zeroing constrainedResolvedToken each iteration #82531
  • Add Microsoft.NET.ILLink package #82407
    linkable-framework, 8.0.0
  • Use asynchronous lock in Parallel.ForEachAsync with synchronous enumerable #82501
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Replace some use of string.CompareOrdinal with string == #82438
  • JIT: don't optimize calls to CORINFO_HELP_VIRTUAL_FUNC_PTR for interface class lookups #82209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Fix perf pipeline runs from variable error #82553
  • JIT: Lift remaining cmov restrictions by introducing GT_SELECTCC #82235
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid locking on every ValidationAttributeStore lookup. #82536
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, 8.0.0
  • Add new System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations features #82311
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Run check before generating the config file #82435
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Update ILLink wording #82050
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Port remaining AOT tests #82509
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Fix JIT pipeline issues with instantiation #82512
  • [Mono]: Add support for lazy runtime init in native-to-managed wrapper, similar to NativeAOT library build. #82253
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Wasi icu loading #82444
  • Adding more SIMD constant folding support #82190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix passing Mac Catalyst -target flag to .mm builds #82292
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix build with old gcc #82513
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Replace RichNav with Code Index #82088
    area-Infrastructure
  • [jiterp] Fix stelem_ref not doing a type check #82507
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Annotation changes only (part 2) #82388
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Deduplicate platform lists in BuildIntegration #82395
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Don't run non-wasm test lanes for jiterpreter-only changes #82510
  • [mono][jit] Refactor SIMD type detection. #82419
  • Proposed host runtime delegate for loading an assembly #82138
    area-Host

Updated

  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [IGNORE][wasi] Open PR to run *all* the tests #81649
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [workloads] Bump net7 package version #82270
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ICorProfiler API to allow profiler created providers to have a callback when a session enables them #80528
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Add System.Globalization.Native builds for iOS-like platforms #82393
    os-ios, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Vectorize ProbabilisticMap.IndexOfAny #80963
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • EventPipe env var to disable stack collection #82470
    EventPipe, 8.0.0
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Convert all usages of target_link_libraries to use PUBLIC/PRIVATE specifiers #81924
    area-Infrastructure
  • Refactor `Interop.LocalAlloc` #82450
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Add support for dumping native stacks with cdb #82189
    area-Infrastructure
  • Create source generator for configuration binding #82179
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [android][ios] Add LibraryBuilder task to support aot library mode #81919
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix rva[cns] folding #81854
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add instrinsics for common Vector128 operations #81782
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Split generic virtual method slot use and impl tracking #82222
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasi+browser] bundle timezones into .wasm #82250
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2121425 #81871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Testmerging JIT/Directed #81969
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix SafeHandle debug-only _ctorStackTrace for mono #82376
  • [release/7.0] Fix disposing root X.509 certificate prematurely for OCSP stapling #82277
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.5
  • Check for pending IO in the portable thread pool's worker threads #82245
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Make `WasmMainJSPath` optional #81484
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Adding HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT #82249
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Initial emscripten 3.1.30 support #81215
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [eventpipe] Perform endian aware serialization of structs and arrays above FireETW layer #80493
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable partial compilation of methods #80635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Let GenTreeCopyOrReload handle scenarios when FEATURE_MULTIREG_RET is disabled #82451
  • [HTTP/3] Attempt at using newer image to allow H/3 Windows stress #82226
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.DirectoryServices #82453
    area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.C.ConfigurationManager #82259
    area-System.Configuration, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Store Parallel.ForEachAsync exceptions from cancellation callbacks #82434
  • Fixed name of frozen string dictionary files #82482
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Replace `SafeLocalAllocHandle` in `System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter` #82456
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter, community-contribution
  • Remove unnecessary `unsafe` modifier from `LibraryImport` methods #82462
    community-contribution
  • [mono] Raise soft RLIMIT_NOFILE on Linux #82429
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [browser] Fixed the 3rd argument for TypedArray.fill() #82480
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-pal and coreclr-debug directories #82380
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-vm and other directories in coreclr #82381
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-jit directory #82379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • provide custom marshaller for USER_INFO_1 #82350
    community-contribution
  • Add bundle tests that don't use the SDK #81187
    area-Host
  • [jiterp] Adjust jiterpreter thresholds to exercise it more on CI #82476
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
